verbs.description: [ARG0: A federal judge] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: sided] [ARG1: with Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's longtime lawyer ,] [ARG2: on the biggest issue in his case] — but she pulled out a wildcard
A federal judge on Thursday sided with Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's longtime lawyer , on the biggest issue in his case — but [ARG0: she] [V: pulled] out [ARG1: a wildcard]
